Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Enacts the employer-assisted housing matching grant act
Summary: Creates an employer-assisted housing match grant program under which certain nonprofit employees may be eligible for a state match for certain employer-provided funds for housing costs.
LawCode: Add ยง47-f, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to enacting the "employer-assisted housing matching grant act"
